data.text: @birdy MENINA PASSARINHO, VEM PRO BRASIL, POR FAVOR!!!
@EvyHarmonyDrew @birdy El próximo viernes 18 de marzo haremos TT para que Birdy venga a Latinoamérica, proyecto junto @birdymx
@birdy Give us a chance! In Latin America we are waiting for you💙 Pleeeeaseee 🙏🏻😞
@birdy Sad to hear cause it's been so dam long 😔 but very much looking forward to next year ❤
@birdy I wish I could go see you! Come to TX! 🥰
@birdy It doesn't matter if it's 2022 or 2023.... only that we see you again is important💛

@birdy ..tickets. I do not mind the money I lost, I just worry that the concert will not take place & i am very sorry, if I do not manage to come to see you next year, I wish you to come to Greece at some point.  We are waiting for you. Lots of love 😩💔💔💔 Rula x 💛

@birdy My dear Birdy,we had booked the concert & flight tickets&the hotel for London(04/05).When I saw the change of date 2023 I thought that a mistake was made..now I realized that it was postponed for a year later.Unfortunately I had to cancel the tickets and I also lost the airline
